data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Lazio get the game underway.
Fabio Maresca awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Atalanta at Stadio Olimpico.
Fabio Maresca signals a Lazio throw-in in Atalanta's half.
Throw-in Atalanta.
In the minute 7, Lazio pushes forward through Luis Alberto, whose finish on goal is saved.
Ciro Immobile (Lazio) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Lazio's Ciro Immobile breaks free at Stadio Olimpico. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 7, Goal kick for Atalanta at Stadio Olimpico.
Throw-in for Lazio in their own half.
Free kick for Atalanta in their own half.
In the minute 10, Papu Gomez (Atalanta) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Robin Gosens puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Hans Hateboer instrumental with a fine assist.
Atalanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 12, Adam Marusic is booked for the home team.
Can Atalanta get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lazio's half?
In the minute 13, Lazio drive upfield and Adam Marusic gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Atalanta defender.
Ball safe as Atalanta is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Atalanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Atalanta's Papu Gomez gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Lazio defender.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Lazio close to the penalty box.
In the minute 16, Berat Djimsiti (Atalanta) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 18, Lazio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Fabio Maresca signals a free kick to Lazio in their own half.
Sergej Milinkovic-Savic for Lazio gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 20, Throw-in high up the field for Lazio in Rome.
Lazio attack but Luis Alberto's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Atalanta goal kick.
In the minute 21, Lazio to take a throw-in in Atalanta territory.
Atalanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Lazio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Lazio in the half of Atalanta.
In Rome a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Atalanta's Remo Freuler has been booked in Rome.
In the minute 26, Luis Alberto (Lazio) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Lazio have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Lazio in the half of Atalanta.
In the minute 30, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Fabio Maresca waits before resuming play because Ruslan Malinovskyi for Atalanta is still down.
Ruslan Malinovskyi has recovered and rejoins the match in Rome.
Great finish from Hans Hateboer to give Atalanta a 0-2 lead.
In the minute 32, Great play from Robin Gosens to set up the goal.
Ciro Immobile (Lazio) strikes â€“ and hits the bar! Ohhhh so close!
In the minute 34, Corner awarded to Lazio.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Lazio have been awarded a corner by Fabio Maresca.
In the minute 35, Luis Alberto for Lazio drives towards goal at Stadio Olimpico. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Fabio Maresca signals a free kick to Atalanta in their own half.
Fabio Maresca signals a free kick to Lazio.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Atalanta in their own half.
Fabio Maresca awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Lazio.
In the minute 40, Free kick Atalanta.
At Stadio Olimpico, Lucas Leiva has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Atalanta's Duvan Zapata gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Olimpico. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 41, Goal! Atalanta extend their lead to 0-3 through Papu Gomez.
Lazio's Adam Marusic is on target but unsuccessful.
Fabio Maresca signals a free kick to Atalanta in their own half.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Lazio at Stadio Olimpico.
Lazio drives forward and Lucas Leiva gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Fabio Maresca will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Fabio Maresca signals a Lazio throw-in in Atalanta's half.
In Rome a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Lazio have been awarded a corner by Fabio Maresca.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Stadio Olimpico.
